body: * Mubadala Development Company reports 16.9 percent stake in Advanced Micro Devices as of July 1 versus 14.8 percent stake as of March 3 - SEC filing Source text: (bit.ly/2sGJWum) Further company coverage:
header: BRIEF-Mubadala Development reports 16.9 pct stake in AMD as of July 1 vs previous stake of 14.8 pct
